title: Ensure blog posts have images in frontend
scope: Update frontend blog rendering to ensure each post displays an image.
Provide graceful fallback behavior when a post lacks an image URL.
acceptance_criteria: Every blog post card/page renders an image (real or fallback).
Missing image URLs do not break layout or cause console errors.
Frontend changes prioritize presentable visuals without backend dependency changes.
risk_notes: Fallback image choice could conflict with current design language.
Assumptions about image field names could hide real data issues.
rollback_plan: Restore previous blog card layout if regressions appear.
